reference.notes: Elements References -------- ---------- H C N O F: T. Enevoldsen, J. Oddershede and S. P. A. Sauer, Correlated calculations of indirect nuclear spin-spin coupling constants using second order polarization propagator approximations : SOPPA and SOPPA(CCSD), Theor. Chem. Acc. 100, 275-284 (1998). H C N O S: P. F. Provasi, G. A. Aucar and S. P. A. Sauer, The effect of lone-pairs and electronegativity on the indirect nuclear spin-spin coupling constants in CH2X (X = CH2, NH, O, S). Ab initio calculations using optimized contracted basis sets, J. Chem. Phys. 115, 1324-1334 (2001). F: V. Barone, P. F. Provasi, J. E. Peralta, J. P. Snyder, S. P. A. Sauer and R. H. Contreras, DFT Substituent Effects on Scalar 2J(19F, 19F) and 3J(19F,19F) NMR Couplings: A Comparison of SOPPA and DFT Methods, J. Phys. Chem. A 107, 4748-4754 (2003).
